m_szDocTitle: Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Price Target Raised at Morgan Stanley - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- TheStreet Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Price Target Raised at Morgan Stanley Tesla Motors's (TSLA) stock price target was increased to $465 from $280 at Morgan Stanley. Rachel Graf Aug 17, 2015 9:24 AM EDT NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors' ( TSLA )  price target was hiked to $465 from $280 at Morgan Stanley on Monday morning. The firm said that the future of electric vehicles is shifting toward an autonomous, shared mobility model in which smart technology propels shared transportation, and Morgan Stanley would be "surprised" if Tesla didn't announce formal
